installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
#################################################
# Copyright (c) Shardbyte. All Rights Reserved. #
# SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT                  #
#################################################
# SteamCMD Installation Script
# Server Files: /mnt/server
# Image: 'ghcr.io/shardbyte/installers:debian'

if [ "${STEAM_USER}" == "" ]; then
    STEAM_USER=anonymous
    STEAM_PASS=""
    STEAM_AUTH=""
fi

cd /tmp
mkdir -p /mnt/server/steamcmd
curl -sSL -o steamcmd.tar.gz https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/client/installer/steamcmd_linux.tar.gz
tar -xzvf steamcmd.tar.gz -C /mnt/server/steamcmd

mkdir -p /mnt/server/Engine/Binaries/ThirdParty/SteamCMD/Linux
tar -xzvf steamcmd.tar.gz -C /mnt/server/Engine/Binaries/ThirdParty/SteamCMD/Linux
mkdir -p /mnt/server/steamapps
cd /mnt/server/steamcmd

chown -R root:root /mnt
export HOME=/mnt/server

./steamcmd.sh +login ${STEAM_USER} ${STEAM_PASS} ${STEAM_AUTH} +force_install_dir /mnt/server +app_update ${SRCDS_APPID} $( [[ -z ${SRCDS_BETAID} ]] || printf %s "-beta ${SRCDS_BETAID}" ) ${EXTRA_FLAGS} validate +quit

mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk32
cp -v linux32/steamclient.so ../.steam/sdk32/steamclient.so

mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk64
cp -v linux64/steamclient.so ../.steam/sdk64/steamclient.so

cd /mnt/server/Engine/Binaries/ThirdParty/SteamCMD/Linux
ln -sf ../../../../../../Steam/steamapps steamapps
cd /mnt/server

echo "-----------------------------------------"
echo "Installation completed..."
echo "-----------------------------------------"

variables.name: Steam App ID
variables.description: ARK Server Steam Application ID

variables.name: Beta Branch (Optional)
variables.description: Steam beta branch for experimental features (e.g., 'experimental' for latest test builds). Leave empty for stable release.

variables.name: World Map
variables.description: The ARK map to load (TheIsland, Ragnarok, Valguero, Genesis, etc.). This determines the game world players will explore.

variables.name: Server Display Name
variables.description: The name shown in the server browser that players will see when looking for servers to join.

variables.name: Server Join Password
variables.description: Password required for players to join the server. Leave empty for a public server that anyone can join.

variables.name: Admin/RCON Password
variables.description: Password for server administration and RCON access. Used for remote server management and admin commands.

variables.name: Maximum Players
variables.description: Maximum number of players that can be connected to the server simultaneously.

variables.name: PvE Mode (Player vs Environment)
variables.description: Enable PvE mode to disable player vs player combat. Players can only fight creatures, not each other.

variables.name: Game Client Port
variables.description: Primary port for player connections to the game server. Must be open in firewall and port forwarded.

variables.name: UDP Socket Port
variables.description: Secondary port for game communications and data transfer. Usually Game Client Port + 1.

variables.name: Server Browser Port
variables.description: Port for server browser queries. Allows players to find your server in the server list.

variables.name: RCON Management Port
variables.description: Port for remote administration via RCON tools. Used for server management and automated tasks.

variables.name: Workshop Mods
variables.description: Comma-separated list of Steam Workshop mod IDs to install (e.g., '731604991,889745138'). Find mod IDs in the workshop URL.

variables.name: Auto-Update Server
variables.description: Automatically check for and install server/mod updates when the server starts. Recommended for keeping mods current.

variables.name: Backup Before Updates
variables.description: Create a backup of your server world before applying updates. Helps protect against update issues.

variables.name: Server Timezone
variables.description: Timezone for server logs and scheduled tasks (e.g., 'America/New_York', 'Europe/London', 'UTC').

variables.name: Debug Logging
variables.description: Enable detailed debug logging for troubleshooting server issues. Only enable when diagnosing problems.

variables.name: ARKManager Version
variables.description: Version branch of ARKManager to use (master=stable, develop=latest features). Advanced users only.

variables.name: Enable Crossplay
variables.description: Allow crossplay between PC (Steam/Epic) and console players (Xbox/PlayStation). Requires compatible client versions.

variables.name: Disable Anti-Cheat (BattlEye)
variables.description: Disable BattlEye anti-cheat system. Required for some mods but reduces cheat protection. Use with caution.
